Name: Mississippi Punch
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Balanced and refreshing. In place of chilled water try cold black tea and up the sugar syrup to 20ml (2/3oz).
Nutrition: One serving of Mississippi Punch contains 215 calories
